::Kluster::

Kluster nods, smiling. "Glad to have you aboard. If you want some quarters, 
just go to the residential area and register some. Other than that, don't go 
into the restricted areas. The defences might open fire. I gotta get back to 
the bridge, see ya around."

Kluster walks through a door, heading for the bridge.
